contents:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Mitchell,
These cases are ruled by the decision in Pittsburg & Lake Erie R. R. Co. v. County of Lawrence, ante, p. 1.
In No. 60, the decree is reversed and bill directed to be dismissed with costs.
In No. 61, the decree is reversed and injunction directed to be awarded against further proceeding in the construction of the bridge in controversy in such manner as to interfere with the property or operations of the complainant. Costs to be paid by the appellees.
